[[inst_v_lhi_u]]
==== V.LHI.U

*Syntax:* v.lhi.u<.local> [SrcL<.ud>, <lc0<<1>, simm], ->Dst.<W>

*Description:* Vector instruction (VEC engine).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_v_lhi_u.svg[V.LHI.U encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* VEC

*Compression:* L64 (len=64)
